description: This course focuses on the art of the narrative video short. Students study the rudiments of visual storytelling by developing their own short projects. Students study all aspects of production from concept to screening, including idea generation, pre-production planning, lighting, shooting, editing, and sound mixing, with special emphasis on innovative approaches to narrative form. Prerequisites: Art 104 or permission of instructor. Materials fee. Offered alternate years.
name: Narrative Video Productio
prerequisites: Prerequisites: Art 104 or permission of instructor. Materials fee. Offered alternate years.
title: Narrative Video Production
